title: Paul O'Grady: TV career highlights for presenter and comedian who died aged 67
content: There was an errorTV Presenter and comedian Paul O'Grady has died at the age of 67.He died "unexpectedly but peacefully" on Tuesday evening, his husband Andre Portasio said in a statement.O'Grady rose to fame with his drag queen persona Lily Savage, and went on to present shows such as Blankety Blank.Later in his career, he brought his love of dogs to the screen.
